availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anderson T. Keen (Laborer, 1st Kentucky Cavalry Major. )

body.p: Born in 1841in Kentucky. Laborer. Married to Sally C. Keen. Children included Willie, Hellen, Flora, Bettie, Robert, and Lena. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on July 25, 1861. Promoted from 1st Sergeant to 1st Lieutenant, December 10, 1861; to Captain, July 4, 1863; to Major, June 1864.

bibl.p: Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, Somerset, ED 87, sheet 130A; Tarrant, Sergeant E., The Wild Riders of the First Kentucky Cavalry : a History of the Regiment, in the Great War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865 : Pathetic Scenes, Amusing Incidents, and Thrilling Episodes, a Regimental Roster, Prison Life, Adventures, and Escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 453.
